products.title: Chateau Blockout Slate Grey Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their chateau blockout collection combines all of the sophisticated look of pleated blinds with the technology of blockout fabrics. It features their solar and thermal fabric technolgy meaning it both keeps your home warm in the winter and cool in the summer. Featured here in their slate grey colour - a tone that is perfect for sleek, modern, and sophisticated decor schemes. Product id: sdb-pfp0165 fabric colour: slate grey material: 100% polyester headrail: minimal perfect fit framework - easy drill-free installation clips control type: manual tensioned pull handle energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes chateau blockout slate grey solar/thermal perfect fit pleated blind.
